channel.title: CVE Feed for unspecified -- Kama Click Counter Plugin
channel.description: The latest CVEs for unspecified -- Kama Click Counter Plugin

item.title: CVE-2017-20103|2024-08-05T21:45:25.774Z -- unspecified -- kama%20click%20counter%20plugin
item.description: A vulnerability classified as critical has been found in Kama Click Counter Plugin up to 3.4.8. This affects an unknown part of the file wp-admin/admin.php. The manipulation of the argument order_by/order with the input ASC%2c(select*from(select(sleep(2)))a) leads to sql injection (Blind). It is possible to initiate the attack remotely. The exploit has been disclosed to the public and may be used. Upgrading to version 3.4.9 is able to address this issue. It is recommended to upgrade the affected component.
